# Pull Request (Website)

**1. Type of Change:**
_What does this PR do? (Check one)_

- [ ] **Bug Fix** (e.g., Fixing a broken tool or layout issue)
- [ ] **New Feature** (e.g., Adding a new tool or page)
- [ ] **Content Update** (e.g., New blog post or text changes)
- [ ] **Code Refactor** (e.g., Cleaning up TypeScript or CSS)

**2. Related Issue:**
_Does this fix an existing issue? Please link it here (e.g., "Closes #24")._

>

**3. Summary of Changes:**
_Briefly explain what you changed and why. (e.g., "Fixed mobile navbar not opening on iOS," "Added a new blog post about Securly SSL decryption")_

>

**4. Verification & Testing:**
_How did you verify these changes?_

- [ ] I have built the worker locally (`pnpm run build`) without errors.
- [ ] I have tested the changes on a local development server (`pnpm run dev`).
- [ ] (If UI related) I have checked how this looks on mobile/Chromebooks.

**5. Screenshots (Optional):**
_If this is a visual change, please paste a screenshot or GIF below to help us review it faster._

>

---

**Final Checklist:**

- [ ] I have read the [Contributing Guidelines](https://github.com/hapara-fail/website/blob/main/CONTRIBUTING.md).
- [ ] My code follows the project's style (clean TypeScript, proper asset placement).
